com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget

Class ResizableComponent<T extends IFixedComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget.ResizableComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the content component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IComponentProxy<T>, IFixedComponent, IFixedComponentProxy<T>, IPopup

    public class ResizableComponent<T extends IFixedComponent>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFixedComponentProxy<T>
    A fixed component that can be resized.

      • createResizableComponent

        public static <S extends IComponent,T extends IComponent,U> IFixedComponent createResizableComponent(S title,
                                                                                                     T content,
                                                                                                     java.util.function.Supplier<U> state,
                                                                                                     AnimatedToggleable open,
                                                                                                     RendererTuple<U> renderer,
                                                                                                     IResizeBorderRenderer resizeRenderer,
                                                                                                     IResizable size,
                                                                                                     IScrollSize scrollSize,
                                                                                                     java.awt.Point position,
                                                                                                     int width,
                                                                                                     boolean savesState,
                                                                                                     java.lang.String configName)
        Creates a closable resizable panel.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the title component type
        T - the content component type
        U - the render state type
        Parameters:
        title - the title component
        content - the content component
        state - the render state
        open - the toggleable for opening an closing
        renderer - the panel renderers to be used
        resizeRenderer - the resize renderer to be sued
        size - the resize behavior, null for normal un-resizable panel
        scrollSize - the scroll behavior
        position - the initial position of the panel
        width - the panel width
        savesState - whether this panel should save the panel state
        configName - the config name of the panel
        Returns:
        the fixed component
